subject: CEGE
name: Honors Research Seminar
info:
Attend twelve (12) research seminars in civil, environmental, and geo- engineering given by faculty members and visiting scholars. Write and submit a summary of each attended seminar. Explicitly interact with four or more of the speakers.

prereq: Upper div CE, EnvE, GeoE, Enrolled in the University Honors Program or instructor consent

subject: CEGE
name: Honors Selected Reading
info:
Selected readings, student presentations.

prereq: Upper div CE, honors

subject: CEGE
name: Senior Honors Thesis
info:
Writing thesis under direction of CE faculty member.

prereq: Upper div CE

subject: CEGE
name: Senior Honors Thesis
info:

prereq: Upper div CE
